      • idf

        public static <TERM> java.util.Map<TERM,java.lang.Double> idf(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Iterable<TERM>> documentVocabularies,
                                                              boolean smooth,
                                                              boolean addOne)
        Inverse document frequency for a set of documents
        Type Parameters:
        TERM - term type
        Parameters:
        documentVocabularies - sets of terms which appear in the documents
        smooth - smooth the counts by treating the document set as if it contained an additional document with every term in the vocabulary
        addOne - add one to idf values to prevent divide by zero errors in tf-idf
        Returns:
        map of terms to their inverse document frequency

      • idf

        public static <TERM> java.util.Map<TERM,java.lang.Double> idf(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Iterable<TERM>> documentVocabularies)

                                                                TfIdf.Normalization normalization)
        tf-idf for a document
        Type Parameters:
        TERM - term type
        Parameters:
        tf - term frequencies of the document
        idf - inverse document frequency for a set of documents
        normalization - none or cosine
        Returns:
        map of terms to their tf-idf values

      • idfFromTfs

        public static <TERM> java.util.Map<TERM,java.lang.Double> idfFromTfs(java.lang.Iterable<java.util.Map<TERM,java.lang.Double>> tfs,
                                                                     boolean smooth,
                                                                     boolean addOne)
        Utility to build inverse document frequencies from a set of term frequencies
        Type Parameters:
        TERM - term type
        Parameters:
        tfs - term frequencies for a set of documents
        smooth - smooth the counts by treating the document set as if it contained an additional document with every term in the vocabulary
        addOne - add one to idf values to prevent divide by zero errors in tf-idf
        Returns:
        map of terms to their tf-idf values
